text: @realDonaldTrump Says the man who grabs women by their p****ies. Says the man who is leading the world in #coronavirus deaths. You are an embarrassment to the #presidency. If you were doing a great job, #RepublicansForBiden and #RepublicansAgainstTrump wouldn’t exist. https://t.co/70wyPmWPXQ
